enhanced_by.reason: Both methods combine multiple Pos instances to create a new Pos, making sum a good candidate for setting up test cases.
The of method creates a Pos from offsets, which can be used to generate test inputs for the plus method.
The plusAll method aggregates multiple Pos instances, similar to plus, and can be used to verify the state after plus is invoked.
The describeTo method can be used to verify the output of the plus method by comparing the string representation of the resulting Pos.
